project: Deduction of points on driving licenses
has been applied in many countries around the
world. Recently, the Ministry of Public Security has proposed to
deduct points from driver's licenses through the draft
law on road traffic order and safety.
This is considered an effective educational solution
for drivers to overcome the
disadvantages of the previous penalty method of punching and
confiscating the license.
According to the proposal, the authorities will
look into specific violations to
punish them.  If the driver's license still has points,
the driver will continue to be allowed to
drive the vehicle after M years from the
last point deduction. If the driver's license still has
points, 12 points will be restored. In my opinion,
the deduction is  The points are quite
reasonable, it's best to have a
roadmap: if in that year
I lose all my points, my
driving license will be revoked, and if in
that year my points are deducted,  If it's still there but it hasn't been
completely eliminated, we can still continue to
use it. The most important thing is that we will have to
develop this form of treatment to
suit the traffic realities
in Vietnam to make it strong enough.  d e
as well as to prevent people from re-
offending. Besides, to avoid the
mentality that if there are points, then there are deductions to manage the
driver throughout the process from
training to the process of complying with the
law of the driver.  violations and

raising awareness of traffic participants,

Domestic air ticket price ceiling will increase by about 3.75 minutes.  Compared
to the current price, it is equivalent to an increase of 50,000
to 250,000 VND for one-way tickets. This will
help airlines be more flexible
in adjusting ticket prices from
time to time, but it will also make many
passengers and travel companies
worried.  In the context of fuel prices and the dollar exchange rate
increasing sharply, the widening of the
ceiling price range for airline tickets will offset investment
costs for airlines,
contributing to the
development of the domestic aviation market.  An opportunity
for airlines to
lower their prices so that they
can serve the needs
of passengers in the segment with
lower affordability or in
the  During the off-peak period, an increase in the
ceiling price of airline tickets will have an immediate impact
on the domestic tourism industry.
Businesses must make corresponding adjustments immediately
after increasing the ceiling price of airline tickets.  It is
also
necessary to research
different marketing strategies to attract
customers. Travel companies must improve
services to help customers
receive more value. Many opinions
say that with increasing prices of
Airlines also need to improve
service quality. Avoid delays in flights.
If tickets for domestic routes are too high,
customers will change direction to travel
abroad, then tourism airlines
will be under oath.

1920 to the present. The statue along with

the temple.  The statue is a
fifth-century BC structure with a
height of about 8 m. The statue is framed
by a huge steel structure nearly
12 m long, divided into shelves to place
broken pieces of the statue.  The monk
chose to place the statue in its
original vertical position in the northern area of
the temple. In Greek mythology, telamon

12, passing through Tu commune, Yen Son district,
Tuyen Quang province, a
traffic accident occurred.  The traffic was particularly serious,
causing five people to
die. The accident occurred when a car from
the side of the road traveling from Hanoi to Hanoi
collided with a container truck running in the
opposite direction. In addition to the five people who died,
there were also five others.  Another injured person was taken
to the hospital for emergency treatment. The victims were a
group of tourists from Long An province on their
way to Noi Bai airport after
traveling to Dong Van Karst Plateau, Ha
Giang province. Initially, both drivers were identified.  The vehicle
does not use alcohol. Vehicle conditions
are guaranteed according to regulations. According to
initial information from the traffic police, the
cause of the accident was due to the
container truck not controlling its speed and steering
to the left on the CG road leading to  The
collision on the road where the accident occurred is a
black spot for traffic safety, where
collisions between
vehicles involved in the accident often occur. Deputy
Prime Minister Tran Luu Quang, Chairman of the
National Traffic Safety Committee  request the Vice
Chairman of the
National Traffic Safety Committee to urgently organize a
working group to the scene to coordinate
with leaders of Tuyen Quang province to arrange for
tutors to visit and express condolences to the
families of the
victims.  Initially, Tuyen
Quang province supported the family of each
deceased victim 10 million VND, supported each
injured victim 5 million VND, the Department of
Labor, War Invalids and Social Affairs of Tuyen Quang
supported Mai Tan with 18 million VND for each victim.
